alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 12 at 2:32PM MDT until October 13 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Castle Rock, Briggsdale, Greeley, Fort Morgan, Byers, Limon, Southern Lincoln County, Sterling, and Akron. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could harm sensitive outdoor vegetation. Sensitive outdoor plants may be killed if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
